name: Necrozma
description: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.

abilities.name: Prism Armor
abilities.effect: Super-effective damage this Pokémon takes is reduced to 0.75×.  This Ability is not bypassed by mold breaker, teravolt, or turboblaze.
abilities.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
